Comment: Trump posted (May 8th):  "Many of our allies and friends are celebrating May 8th as Victory Day, but we did more than any other Country, by far, in producing a victorious result on World War II. I am hereby renaming May 8th as Victory Day for World War II and November 11th as Victory Day for World War I. We won both Wars, nobody was close to us in terms of strength, bravery, or military brilliance, but we never celebrate anything—That’s because we don’t have leaders anymore, that know how to do so! We are going to start celebrating our victories again!"  David Frum replied (in part):  "That post was such a perfect crystallization of the Trump style: bombast, boast, all of it making Trump himself the center of a story that he had nothing whatsoever to do with.  **The statement is unwise and unattractive in all kinds of other ways too.**  It denigrates the sacrifices and heroism of others.  And it turns the tragedy and horror of war into a triumphant narrative that was completely alien to almost all the people who experienced it as nothing but a tale of suffering and waste and cruelty and misery.  "... as so often when Donald Trump talks about American military history, he emphasizes power and success and triumph and military genius, but always lacking is any mention of the values for which Americans fought.  America didn’t go (to war) to be top nation, to beat and dominate others.  It went to defend things ... regarded as precious.  I think it’s more useful to think about what began the process of reconstruction and reconciliation that occupied the next eight decades: the way in which former enemies became present partners, the way the Germans and the Japanese themselves discovered, in their own defeat, their own liberation because **they came to accept the values for which Americans went into battle.**"

Comment: They're just being disengenious.   It's just more dumb shit from dumb people. Most of us who are up in arms here and now *were* talking about and expressing dismay for the terrible shit Dems have done. Anyone with half a brain can see that Trump is a thousand times worse than the worst shit the Dems have done.   We *did* raise hell about Dems being cool with drone striking children and selling out to major corporations.   It's just that Trump is doing that while also speedrunning straight up fascism, destroying the economy, and trying to be above the law while refusing due process and constitutional protections to the average people.   It's like complaining that we are bitching about having our legs cut off when we didn't bitch about having our pointer finger broken. We *did* bitch about our finger, abd if someone can't figure out how losing both legs suddenly and violently is worse, that person us either remarkably stupid or just full of shit.
